metadata.Title: CVE-2017-10807 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
JabberD 2.x (aka jabberd2) before 2.6.1 allows anyone to authenticate using SASL ANONYMOUS, even when the sasl.anonymous c2s.xml option is not enabled.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-10807` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

jabberd2 - 2.6.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jabberd2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.1-1').
